function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High indoor air pollution levels compared to outdoor levels","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and other health issues","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and maintenance of ventilation systems, use of air purifiers","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate methods for volatile organic compounds (VOCs) removal from indoor air","Impact":"Continued exposure to harmful gases and air pollutants","Mitigation":"Exploration of biological methods for VOCs removal, regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation systems","Technologies":"Biological methods for VOCs removal, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of indoor air quality improvement methods","Impact":"Continued health risks and reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Research and development of more effective indoor air quality improvement technologies, regular monitoring and assessment of air quality","Technologies":"Advanced air quality monitoring systems, improved ventilation design","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"}]}
